title: The Transferable Development Rights (TDR) generated from any land use zone shall be utilised on any receiving plot irrespective of the land use zone including development plan reservations of buildable nature and anywhere in congested or non-congested area or town planning scheme area earmarked on Development Plan
clause_text: The Transferable Development Rights (TDR) generated from any land use zone shall be utilised on any receiving plot irrespective of the land use zone including development plan reservations of buildable nature and anywhere in congested or non-congested area or town planning scheme area earmarked on Development Plan. The equivalent quantum of Transferable Development Rights (TDR) to be permitted on receiving plot shall be governed by the formula given below :- X = Permissible Utilisation of TDR / DR in sq.m. on receiving plot.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
